title: Sweet potato parsnip soup
ingredients: ['1 knob of butter or 1 dessertspoon olive oil', '1 carrot, peeled and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 large parsnips, peeled and chopped', '1 large sweet potato, peeled and chopped', 'water to cover', '150ml goat milk (or cow or soya milk)']
